channel.title: WinterScapePk/Skilling 317 - Perfected Pking | Dedicated Hosting | Dedicated SPT
channel.description:
Before you see anything about the server, don't flame, we are a new server and we're still coding everything. [center]
[size=14pt][b][url=http://www.winterscape.freeforums.org]Website/Forums[/url][/b][/size]
[b]Features[/b] 100% Pk Works Custom Shops - Reasonable Prices Awesome Skilling Custom Built Spawn Area Training Area %100 Majority of Skills %100 Donator Island Donator Status
[b]The Rules[/b] [b]1.[/b] Please be mature, don't keep cursing, and making jokes. [b]2.[/b] Don't curse alot! You can curse to a minimum, no dropping the [b]f bomb[/b] though. [b]3.[/b] Don't beg for items or staff member position, it really get's annoying... [b]4.[/b] Don't spam the staff members, please wait until they speak to you to help you.
[b]Media[/b]
[/center]

item.title: WinterScapePk/Skilling 317 - Perfected Pking | Dedicated Hosting | Dedicated SPT
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

[quote=“joelandjacob, post:14, topic:447648”][quote author=Reamm28 link=topic=550539.msg4036129#msg4036129 date=1341220578]

bump

That wouldn’t make a different since this server is a load of unnecessary files put together to make what ever you call this; hence players don’t play with caca, they wouldn’t join.

…?

Stating what I think of the server, un-fair advantages, no self rights as in point of views, no way of showing emotion or expression, there is nothing positive of the server.
[/quote]
Look motherfucker, stop flaming, and acctually join the server. Don’t flame if you haven’t been on the server.[/quote]

I did play.

Read full topic
